Thanks for playing!","genre":""},{"creatorId":1848960,"creatorName":"Nikilis","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":4258382,"totalDownVotes":358654,"universeId":66654135,"name":"Murder Mystery 2","placeId":142823291,"playerCount":108267,"imageToken":"T_142823291_8b7a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you solve the Mystery and survive each round?

Collect and trade hundreds of knives!

Rumble Awakening + Island + Cyborg ++ MORE!

Welcome to Blox Fruits! Become a master swordsman or a powerful blox fruit user as you train to become the strongest player to ever live. You can choose to fight against tough enemies or have powerful boss battles while sailing across the ocean to find hidden secrets. 

Current level cap: 1525
Current fruits in the game:
Bomb, Spike, Chop, Spring, Smoke, Flame, Ice, Sand, Dark, Light, Magma, Rubber, Quake, Human Buddha, Barrier String, Bird Phoenix, Rumble, Paw, Gravity, Dough, Control, and Dragon!
FAQ:
- Fruits spawn in the map every hour / despawn after 20. 
- You can buy fruits from the Blox Fruits Dealer. He restocks random fruits every 4 hours 
- More info in the group description

Do not exploit or auto farm, our auto-detection will catch you and we do not appeal our bans.","genre":""},{"creatorId":1226491,"creatorName":"RELL World","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1152636,"totalDownVotes":72576,"universeId":1511883870,"name":"[EVENT] Shindo ","placeId":4616652839,"playerCount":38467,"imageToken":"T_4616652839_4a58","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Forged Rengoku Event

If you've played SkyWars before, you'll pickup BedWars in no time!","genre":""},{"creatorId":29622,"creatorName":"callmehbob","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2253232,"totalDownVotes":305922,"universeId":321778215,"name":"Royale🏰High","placeId":735030788,"playerCount":43427,"imageToken":"T_735030788_21f6","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🌊 Summer Wave 1: Welcome to Summer World, Diamond Beach! ✧~♡~✧
♡Use your Teleportation Sceptre to fast-travel across magical lands, with secrets to explore & fun games to play!
♡Games earn you the valuable currency 💎Diamonds, increases your level, & challenges your knowledge and skills!
♡Spend your diamonds in the shop, which sells special items during real-life seasons.
♡Dress your character to suit your mood & personality~ free makeup, hairstyles, & thousands of unique outfits for any occasion!
♡Level up at Royale High School by attending classes! The higher grades you receive, the more rewards you earn!
♡Make sure to bring the right book to class from your locker, and turn in your completed homework!
♡Try to balance your studies and socializing, as many best friends have been made within these halls♡","genre":""},{"creatorId":5292947,"creatorName":"Top Down Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":694891,"totalDownVotes":51362,"universeId":1720936166,"name":"[SUMMERFEST] All Star Tower Defense","placeId":4996049426,"playerCount":30964,"imageToken":"T_4996049426_1b09","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"⚔️Use your units to fend off waves of enemies

🎨 Designed by asimo3089.  @asimo3089","genre":""},{"creatorId":4914494,"creatorName":"Paradoxum Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":681295,"totalDownVotes":48729,"universeId":1176784616,"name":"[FIXED!] Tower Defense Simulator","placeId":3260590327,"playerCount":20235,"imageToken":"T_3260590327_d762","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"In this world, no one can survive alone. For support go to support.yx.zone","genre":""},{"creatorId":3642592,"creatorName":"Schwifty Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1379120,"totalDownVotes":290771,"universeId":498490399,"name":"🌎 Mad City ","placeId":1224212277,"playerCount":20236,"imageToken":"T_1224212277_2d87","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🌎🌎🌎

Special thanks to these awesome people: 
@TacticalFrosty@rightIess @kiouhei @Mockerii @Ep1cDrew @PixelatedCandy @DevFoxby @ItsAmmon @PerhapzRBLX @FoxOfJulyy","genre":""},{"creatorId":2782840,"creatorName":"Chillz Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1623484,"totalDownVotes":132751,"universeId":210851291,"name":"Build A Boat For Treasure","placeId":537413528,"playerCount":25830,"imageToken":"T_537413528_d6fc","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Build your ship and set sail for your adventure!

Don't forget to check out our group!

Group Perks:
✨Member✨
--- 25% more gold!
💫Mega Member💫
--- 300% more health!
--- 25% more gold!
🌟Royal Member🌟
--- +4 Barrels Of TNT!
--- 300% more health!
--- 25% more gold!","genre":""},{"creatorId":4698921,"creatorName":"Da Hood Entertainment","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":385473,"totalDownVotes":196656,"universeId":1008451066,"name":"Da Hood","placeId":2788229376,"playerCount":17071,"imageToken":"T_2788229376_aeaa","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A difficult game, read below for tips.
Account has to be at least 10 days to play.

[PC/XBOX Controls][F/ButtonY - Block][E/PadDown - Stomp][G/PadUp - Carry][LCTRL+ButtonB - Crouch]
Crouch+Carry = Ragdoll thrown.
You can weave 100% if you time at the right time when blocking.

To gain muscle buy weights at fitness.
Eat lettuce to reduce muscle.

Cop: To join cops go to the police station, if you execute anyone without cuffs you'll be automatically kicked off. Use cuffs instead.

Criminals: Ransack banks and several others small time shops in order to gain wanted or cash.

cash drop takes 30%
